basic.description:
{Basic Scouting}

Allows your hero to see 2 square further into the shroud and increases movement points by 200.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Scouting}

Allows your hero to see 3 square further into the shroud and increases movement points by 250.

expert.description:
{Expert Scouting}

Allows your hero to see 5 square further into the shroud and increases movement points by 300.
